author: Buddha
message: We are shaped by our thoughts; we become what we think. When the mind is pure, joy follows like a shadow that never leaves.
title: Thought of the day

author: Tony Robbins
message: Stay committed to your decisions, but stay flexible in your approach.
title: Thought of the day

author: Albert Schweitzer
message: An optimist is a person who sees a green light everywhere, while the pessimist sees only the red spotlight... The truly wise person is colour-blind.
title: Thought of the day

author: Donald Trump
message: What separates the winners from the losers is how a person reacts to each new twist of fate.
title: Thought of the day
